method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _getcurvn
method.comment: Returns current version number value (as a string) Valid only after calling ReadCurVN

method.name: _getpackagename
method.comment: Gets back the package name set for this app. Used internally.

method.name: _getstatus
method.comment: Returns current internal status. Negatives denote ERRORS/WARNINGS.

method.name: _getwebchangelog
method.comment: Returns optional change log data (as a string) as read from the .txt file on the webserver Valid only after calling ReadWebVN

method.name: _getwebvn
method.comment: Returns the version number value (as a string) as read from the .txt file on the webserver. Valid only after calling ReadWebVN

method.name: _initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object. You can add parameters to this method if needed.

method.name: _readcurvn
method.comment: Reads current version number from running copy of apk (see #VersionName). Valid if StatusCode = OK_CURVER

method.name: _readwebvn
method.comment: Reads version number as published in the .txt file on webserver Valid if StatusCode = OK_WEBVER

method.name: _setandstartsplashscreen
method.comment: Optional sub - superimposes a simple splash screen on the calling Activity. To remove the splash screen, call StopSplashScreen from Activity (generally in the callback function. See "Initialize") CallingAct - Activity object whose layout will be superimposed with BM in a panel BM - Bitmap object to be shown while apk checking is in progress

method.name: _setcredentials
method.comment: Sets Username and Password to use when downloading from a protected website folder

method.name: _setnewverapk
method.comment: Complete path to the new apk for your app, available for download

method.name: _setnewvertxt
method.comment: Complete path to the .txt file having a single line of text formatted as ver=x.xx where x.xx corresponds to the newest web-published app's version

method.name: _setpackagename
method.comment: Sets package name for this app. It should equal the value in menu "Project.Package Name" Example: com.test.myapp

method.name: _stopsplashscreen
method.comment: Stops and removes the superimposed splash screen

method.name: _updateapk
method.comment: Check on website for a newer apk version and (if any exists) downloads it. We don't know if the user will then install it..

property.name: _curvn
property.comment: Returns current version number value (as a string) Valid only after calling ReadCurVN

property.name: _packagename
property.comment: Gets back the package name set for this app. Used internally.

property.name: _status
property.comment: Returns current internal status. Negatives denote ERRORS/WARNINGS.

property.name: _webchangelog
property.comment: Returns optional change log data (as a string) as read from the .txt file on the webserver Valid only after calling ReadWebVN

property.name: _webvn
property.comment: Returns the version number value (as a string) as read from the .txt file on the webserver. Valid only after calling ReadWebVN

property.name: _newverapk
property.comment: Complete path to the new apk for your app, available for download

property.name: _newvertxt
property.comment: Complete path to the .txt file having a single line of text formatted as ver=x.xx where x.xx corresponds to the newest web-published app's version
